testcase.name: As a admin I should be able create new user
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Actitime Loging Page......................................passed When I Enter my Username as "admin"........................................passed And I Enter my Password as "manager".......................................passed And I click on Loging button................................................passed Then I should be able to successfuly loging to Actitime.....................passed When I Click on the Users tab...............................................passed Then I should be able to successfuly switch Users Page......................passed When I Click on the New User button........................................passed Then I should see New user creation panel...................................passed When I Enter my FirstName as "Jhon"........................................passed And I Enter my LastName as "Parker"........................................passed And I Enter my Email as "Jparker@gmail.com"................................passed And I click on submit button................................................passed Then I should be able to successfuly create new user........................passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed
